title: Two killed in stabbing and suspected car-ramming in northern Israel
description: Defence minister instructs military to respond with force in West Bank, where he said attacker was from
content:
A Palestinian motorist ran over a man and stabbed a woman in northern Israel, killing both, Israeli emergency services say.
The assailant, from the occupied West Bank, was shot and wounded by a civilian at the scene on Friday and taken to hospital, I... [1549 chars]

title: Israel recognises Somaliland as independent state, Netanyahu says
description: The decision has been condemned by Somalia, Egypt, Turkey and Djibouti, who call it a dangerous precedent.
content:
Israel has become the first country to formally recognise Somalia's breakaway region of Somaliland as an independent nation.
Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, said Israel intended to immediately expand cooperation in agriculture, health, and technol... [1553 chars]

title: Championship roundup: Wrexham stun Sheffield United in eight-goal thriller
description: Wrexham battled back from two goals down to beat Sheffield United 5-3, after Coventry had stretched their lead at the top by edging out Swansea 1-0
content: Kieffer Moore struck twice against his old club as Wrexham recovered from 3-1 down to beat Sheffield United 5-3 in a late afternoon Boxing Day thriller at STōK Cae Ras. Patrick Bamford had looked like stealing the headlines with a well-taken early do... [6111 chars]

title: Afcon roundup: Mohamed Salah strikes again as 10-man Egypt hold off South Africa
description: Mohamed Salah scored a first-half penalty as 10-man Egypt defeated South Africa 1-0 in their Africa Cup of Nations Group B clash to become the first team into the knockout stages
content:
Mohamed Salah scored a first-half penalty as 10-man Egypt defeated South Africa 1-0 in their Africa Cup of Nations Group B clash in Agadir on Friday to become the first team into the knockout stages of the competition.

title: Adam Peaty wedding LIVE: Swimmer's mum admits 'it's as if they've cut out my heart'
description: Adam Peaty and Holly Ramsay will marry one another tomorrow, but just hours before the big day, his heartbroken mother Caroline insists she should be there
content:
Adam has been counting down the days
